00021    /* 
00022    * Constructor.
00023    */
00024    LJPair::LJPair() 
00025     : maxPairCutoff_(0.0),
00026       nAtomType_(0),
00027       isInitialized_(false)
00028    {}
00029    
00030    /* 
00031    * Copy constructor.
00032    */
00033    LJPair::LJPair(const LJPair& other)
00034     : maxPairCutoff_(other.maxPairCutoff_),
00035       nAtomType_(other.nAtomType_),
00036       isInitialized_(other.isInitialized_)
00037    {
00038       int i,j;
00039       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00040          for (j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00041             epsilon_[i][j] = other.epsilon_[i][j];
00042             sigma_[i][j]   = other.sigma_[i][j];
00043             cutoff_[i][j]  = other.cutoff_[i][j];
00044             sigmaSq_[i][j] = other.sigmaSq_[i][j];
00045             cutoffSq_[i][j]= other.cutoffSq_[i][j];
00046             ljShift_[i][j] = other.ljShift_[i][j];
00047          } 
00048       }
00049    }
00050    
00051    /* 
00052    * Assignment operator.
00053    */
00054    LJPair& LJPair::operator = (const LJPair& other)
00055    {
00056       maxPairCutoff_ = other.maxPairCutoff_;
00057       nAtomType_     = other.nAtomType_;
00058       isInitialized_ = other.isInitialized_;
00059       int i,j;
00060       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00061          for (j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00062             epsilon_[i][j] = other.epsilon_[i][j];
00063             sigma_[i][j]   = other.sigma_[i][j];
00064             cutoff_[i][j]  = other.cutoff_[i][j];
00065             sigmaSq_[i][j] = other.sigmaSq_[i][j];
00066             cutoffSq_[i][j]= other.cutoffSq_[i][j];
00067             ljShift_[i][j] = other.ljShift_[i][j];
00068          } 
00069       }
00070       return *this;
00071    }

00073    /* 
00074    * Set nAtomType
00075    */
00076    void LJPair::setNAtomType(int nAtomType) 
00077    {  
00078       if (nAtomType <= 0) {
00079          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType <= 0");
00080       }
00081       if (nAtomType > MaxAtomType) {
00082          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType > LJPair::MaxAtomType");
00083       }
00084       nAtomType_ = nAtomType;
00085    }
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * Reset epsilon_[i][j] after initialization
00089    */
00090    void LJPair::setEpsilon(int i, int j, double epsilon)
00091    {
00092 
00093       // Preconditions
00094       if (!isInitialized_) {
00095          UTIL_THROW("Cannot modify epsilon before LJPair is initialized");
00096       }
00097       if (i < 0 || i >= nAtomType_) {
00098          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom type index i");
00099       }
00100       if (j < 0 || j >= nAtomType_) {
00101          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom type index j");
00102       }
00103 
00104       epsilon_[i][j] = epsilon;
00105 
00106       // Calculate shift
00107       double r6i = sigmaSq_[i][j]/cutoffSq_[i][j];
00108       r6i = r6i*r6i*r6i;
00109       ljShift_[i][j] = -4.0*epsilon_[i][j]*(r6i*r6i - r6i);
00110 
00111       // Symmetrize
00112       if (j != i) {
00113          epsilon_[j][i] = epsilon_[i][j];
00114          ljShift_[j][i] = ljShift_[i][j];
00115       }
00116    } 
00117 
00118    /*
00119    * Reset sigma_[i][j] after initialization
00120    */
00121    void LJPair::setSigma(int i, int j, double sigma)
00122    {
00123 
00124       // Preconditions
00125       if (!isInitialized_) {
00126          UTIL_THROW("Cannot modify sigma before LJPair is initialized");
00127       }
00128       if (i < 0 || i >= nAtomType_) {
00129          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom type index i");
00130       }
00131       if (j < 0 || j >= nAtomType_) {
00132          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom type index j");
00133       }
00134 
00135       sigma_[i][j]   = sigma;
00136       sigmaSq_[i][j] = sigma*sigma;
00137 
00138       // Recalculate shift
00139       double r6i = sigmaSq_[i][j]/cutoffSq_[i][j];
00140       r6i = r6i*r6i*r6i;
00141       ljShift_[i][j] = -4.0*epsilon_[i][j]*(r6i*r6i - r6i);
00142 
00143       // Symmetrize
00144       if (j != i) {
00145          sigma_[j][i]   = sigma_[i][j];
00146          sigmaSq_[j][i] = sigmaSq_[i][j];
00147          ljShift_[j][i] = ljShift_[j][i];
00148       }
00149 
00150    } 
00151 
00152    /* 
00153    * Read potential parameters from file.
00154    */
00155    void LJPair::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00156    {
00157       if (nAtomType_ == 0) {
00158          UTIL_THROW( "nAtomType must be set before readParam");
00159       }
00160    
00161       // Read parameters
00162       // readBegin(in,  "LJPair");
00163       readCArray2D<double> (
00164                   in, "epsilon", epsilon_[0], nAtomType_, nAtomType_);
00165       readCArray2D<double>(
00166                   in, "sigma", sigma_[0], nAtomType_, nAtomType_);
00167       readCArray2D<double>(
00168                   in, "cutoff", cutoff_[0], nAtomType_, nAtomType_);
00169       //readEnd(in);
00170    
00171       // Initialize dependent variables sigmaSq, cutoffSq, and ljShift,
00172       // and calculate maxPairCutoff_
00173       double r6i;
00174       int i, j;
00175       maxPairCutoff_ = 0.0;
00176       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00177          for (j = 0; j < nAtomType_; ++j) {
00178             sigmaSq_[i][j]  = sigma_[i][j]*sigma_[i][j];
00179             cutoffSq_[i][j] = cutoff_[i][j]*cutoff_[i][j];
00180             r6i = sigmaSq_[i][j]/cutoffSq_[i][j];
00181             r6i = r6i*r6i*r6i;
00182             ljShift_[i][j] = -4.0*epsilon_[i][j]*(r6i*r6i - r6i);
00183             if (cutoff_[i][j] > maxPairCutoff_ ) {
00184                maxPairCutoff_ = cutoff_[i][j];
00185             }
00186          } // end for j
00187       } // end for i
00188 
00189       isInitialized_ = true;
00190    
00191    }
00192 
00193    /* 
00194    * Get maximum of pair cutoff distance, for all atom type pairs.
00195    */
00196    double LJPair::maxPairCutoff() const
00197    { return maxPairCutoff_; }
00198 
00202    std::string LJPair::className() const
00203    {  return std::string("LJPair"); }
00204  
00205    /* 
00206    * Get pair interaction strength.
00207    */
00208    double LJPair::epsilon(int i, int j) const
00209    { 
00210       assert(i >= 0 && i < nAtomType_); 
00211       assert(j >= 0 && j < nAtomType_); 
00212       return epsilon_[i][j]; 
00213    }
00214 
00215    /* 
00216    * Get pair interaction strength.
00217    */
00218    double LJPair::sigma(int i, int j) const
00219    {
00220       assert(i >= 0 && i < nAtomType_); 
00221       assert(j >= 0 && j < nAtomType_); 
00222       return sigma_[i][j]; 
00223    }
00224 
00225    /*
00226    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00227    */
00228    void LJPair::set(std::string name, int i, int j, double value)
00229    {
00230       if (name == "epsilon") {
00231          epsilon_[i][j] = value;
00232          epsilon_[j][i] = value;
00233       } else
00234       if (name == "sigma") {
00235          sigma_[i][j] = value;
00236          sigma_[j][i] = value;
00237       } else {
00238          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00239       }
00240    }
00241 
00242    /*
00243    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00244    */
00245    double LJPair::get(std::string name, int i, int j) const
00246    {
00247       double value;
00248       if (name == "epsilon") {
00249          value = epsilon_[i][j];
00250       } else
00251       if (name == "sigma") {
00252          value = sigma_[i][j];
00253       } else
00254       if (name == "cutoff") {
00255          value = cutoff_[i][j];
00256       } else {
00257          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00258       }
00259       return value;
00260    }
